div.p: Alexandros to Kleon, greetings. [...] those [...] nomarchs [...] they give [...] about the [...] to be given [...] we have written you that the [...] should be given to him [...] 5,000 are to be given. Some want about 200 [...] of tamarisk (twigs). Write to him from Ptolemais [to give ...] as well as the nomarchy of Diogenes.
From Alexandros. Translation: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 72, Â© Peeters
